div.p:
Be It kend' tile ale men be thir present lettres ws prouost bailyeis
Counsel ande Communite of Abirdene tile haue set ande to maile lattin
ande thir present lettres settis ande to maile lattis tile our lufit nychtbur
ande conburges Johnne Arthour ale ande haile our landis of the kingis
Wellis witht the pertinence lyande within the fredome of the saide burgh'
for ale the termes of five yeiris To be haldin ande haide ale and'
haile our said landis witht thair pertinentis to the saide Johnne his
ayris ande assignes na gretar thane him self Induellaris the said'
burgh witht pastouris lesouris and' with ale vthir ande sindrie fredomis
commoditeis asiamentis and' proffitis pertening or may pertene thairto aucht
and' Wont as thai ly in linth and' breid' quhile the said' fiwe
yeris be fullely runnyne The entray of the said' Johnne salbe In
and witht the said landis at the feist of Witsonday the xxvij day of the monetht
of maij the yeir of god' jM vC ande nyne yeiris Ande frathinfurth
furth to continew in peciabile Josing ande brevking the samyn quhile
ale the termes of fiwe yeiris hail ande to giddir be fullely compleit
and runnyne but ony Interrupcion or brek of termis or yeiris question'
Impediment or demand' of ws or our successouris to be maid' in the contrar
The said' Johnne his ayris na gretar thane him self payande
yeirly til ws and' our successouris fourty schillingis vsual money
of scotland' of penny maile at tua vsuale termes' in the yeir vitsonday
and martimes' in vyntir be evinlie porcionis Allanerly for ale vthir and sindrie
termes Ande we the said' prouost bailyeis Counsel and' Communite ande
our successouris sale warrand' keip ande defend' ale ande haile the
said landis of the Kingis Wellis with thir pertinence to the said' Johnne his
ayris and assignais na gretar thane him self Induellaris the said' burgh
for ale the termes of five yeris as said' Is be al our gudis aganis ale
deidly In Witnessing of the quhilkis our comon Seile Is appensit
to thir presentis At the said' burgh the xxv day of maij the yeir of
god' jM vC ane nyne yeris
gilbert menyeis manu propria
Johnne Collisoun
manu propria
Johnne of Cullane Manu
propria
Andreas Cullane
manu propria

Be It kende Tile ale ale men be thir present lettrez ws prouost
bailyeis Counsel and' Communite of Abirdene with ane' consent and assent
tile haue set ande to maile lattin ande be thir present lettrez Settis ande to
maile lattis til our louit Wilyeam makesone' mylnar ale and haile
our tua Justice myllis with thar pertinence lyand' within the fredome of our
said' burgh for ale the termes of sevin yeris To be haldin ande haid
ale ande hail our said' tua myllis witht the pertinentis to the saide
Wilyeam ande his helpis ane or may na gretar thane him self In
duellaris the said' mylnis witht ale ande Sindrie multuris pendiclis'
commoditeis asiamentis and' profftitis aucht ande wont pertenyng or maye
pertene thairto quhile the said' sevin yeris haile and' togiddir be fullely
compleit ande runnyne The Entrey of the said' Wilyeam ande his
helpis ane or maye nagretar thane him self salbe in ande witht
the said' myllis with thair pertinencis at the feist of witsondaye next and'
Inmediat followand' the dait of thir lettres And' frathinfurth to continew
in peciable Josing ande brewking the samyn quhile ale the termes
of sevin yeris hail ande to giddir be fullely compleit ande runnyne
but ony Interrupcion or brek of term or yeiris questioun Impediment
or demand' of ws or our successouris to be maid in the Contrair
The said' Williame ande his helpis ane or may na gretar
thane him self payand' yeirly til ws or our assignais tene merkis
vsuale money of scotland' of penny maile at tua vsuale termes in the
yeir vitsonday to mertimes in vyntir be evinly porcionis Allanerly
for ale vthir thingis that may be askit or requerit tharof Induring
the said sevin yeiris And' attour the said' Williame sal sal byg and
vpmak one his awin expens' ane malt Cobile ane malt hous'
ande the said' tua myllis in ale thingis devlie as efferis Ande sale
deliuer thame weile ande sufficiently biggit in ale thingis according thair
to to the prouost and' Counsel of the said' burgh for the tyme at the
Ischey of his termes of the said' sevin yerires yeiris be the Conside
racioun of five perosnis suorn' thairto but fraud' or gile Nocth witht
standing the said' Wilyeam haid tua yeiris tak of the said' tua myllis
obefor quhilk is Imput ande Ekit in this assedacioun' And' we
sale warrand' keip ande defend' alle ad' hail our said' tua myllis
termes of sevin yeir as said' Is aganis ale dedly ale fraude
gile secludit and away put In vitnessing of the Quhilkis we
haue appensit our common' Seile to this presentis At Abirdene'
the sextene day of the moneth of Aprile the yeir of god' jM
vC and nyne yeiris et cetera

Be It kend tile ale me be thir present lettres ws prouost baillies counsal and'
Communite of Abirdene with ane' consent and assent tile haue set ande to maile
lattin ande be thir present lettres settis ande to maile lattis til our louit Androw gordoun'
baxtair conburges of the said' burgh ale ande hail our vuyr myln' and neddir
myln' with thair pertinentis lyand within the said burgh for ale the termes of sevin
yeris To be haldin and haid ale ande hail our dais' tua mylnis with the pertinentis
to the said Androw ande his helpis ane or may na gretar thane him self
Induellaris of the said' burgh with ale ande sindrie multuris fredomis commoditeis
asiamentis ande proffitis pertenand' or may pertene thairto quhile the said' sevin
yeris be fullely runnyne The Entray of the said Androw ande his helpis
ane' or may salbe in ande with the said' mylnis with thir pertinentis at the feist of Wit
sonday next and' Immediat eftir following the dait of thir lettres Ande frathin
furth to Continew in peciable Josing ande brewking the samyn ay and quhile
the said' termes of sevin yeiris hail and to giddir be fullely compleit ande
runnyne but ony Interrupcion or brek of termes or yeiris questioun' Impediment
or demand' of ws or our successouris to be maid' in the Contrar The
said' Adnrow ande his helpis ane or may payand' yeirly or til ws
our successouris or assignez auchtene merkis vsuail monee of scotlande
of mail for the said' vuyr myln' and tene merkis vsuail money of
scotland' tile our common Clerk of the said' burgh' for the tyme
At tua vsuail termes in the yeir Witsonday and mertimes in wyntir
be evinly porcionis Allanerly for ale vthir thingis that may be askit or
requirit tharof Induring the said sevin yeris Ande Attour the said'
Androw sale deliuer the said' tua mylnis weile ande sufficiently biggit
In ale thingis according to thaim at the Ischey of the said' termes of
vij yeiris to the prouost bailyeis ande Counsel of the said burgh'
for the tyme but fraud' or gile and' we the saidis prouost
bailyeis Cownsel and' Communite and our successouris sale varrand'
keip and' defend' ale ande haile the said' tua mylnis with thir pertinentis
to the said' Adnrow and his helpis na gretar thane him self induellaris
of the said' burgh for ale the termes of sevin yeiris as said' Is
aganis ale deidly Al fraud and' gile away put In witnessing
of the quhilkis we haue appensit our Common Seile to thir lettres At
Abirdene the sextene day of the moneth of Aprile the yeir of god'
jM vC ande nyne yeiris et cetera

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene Tenta in pretorio eiusdem sexto
die mensis augusti Anno quo supra

Eodem die Dauid ruthirfurd' fecit constituit Creauit et nominauit Magistrum
Johannem lindesaye suum verum legittimum et Indubitatum procuratorem actorem
et factorem dans et concedens eidem ac suis substitutis pluribus et vnj suam liberam
potestatem ac mandatum speciale Ad prosequendum Donaldi baxtair pro sex barrellis
ador Ac in omnibus alijs actionibus et causis ipsum concernens in vberiori forma pro
curatoria Promittens de rato et grato Cum Ceteris clausulis necessarejs
et oportunis

The saide daye the Court wardit schev for lave ande It was gevin
for dome be the moutht of fynne dempstar that Duncane Craik
haid failyeit in his preif of thre franch crownis quhilkis he tuk to
preif vas renuncit ande forgivin to him be symone ellon burges of the
said' burgh

The said' daye the bailyeis assignit this day viij dais to mastir
Dauid lovsone to ansuer to the borgh fundin one him be robert hile
for the vrangis' withhaldin fra him of tuenty schillingis

The said' daye the bailyeis chargit Duncane Craik to pay simone
ellone thre franch crovnis within terme of lave aucht to him eftir the
tenour of the said Duncanis obligacioun

The said' daye Johnne Cormag' varnit' ande Comperit til ansuer for
the stribulance of androw vobstar at the brig of polgovny quhilk Androve
Comperit nocht to follow him tharfor he protestit for his costis ande skathis
and' that he suld' nocht ansueir quhil he be persevit and nevlie varnit

Eodem die Willelmus lindesay et agnes scherar sponsa sua fecerunt con
stituerunt et ordinarunt magistrum Johannem lindesay et thomam leslie suos
veros legittimos et indubitatos procuratores actores factores et deputatos
speciales dans et Concedens eisdem ac eorum alterj suam liberam et Integram potestatem
mandatumque speciale pro se et nomine suo ad prosequendum

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene Tenta in pretorio eiusdem nono
die mensis augusti anno quo supra

The said daye the prouost and ballies assignit the xj daye of
this Instant moneth of august to thomas chavmir to bring vith
him his licence of the bigging of ane hingand' stair windois and'
ane' conduit of ane' draucht apone' the vest gavil of his land ner
rast patry leslyis land' witht Intimacioun' as efferis eftir the tenour
of aour Souerane lordis lettrez' direct' tharapone' .

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene Tenta in pretorio eiusdem decimo
tercio die mensis augusti Anno Dominj millesimo quingentesimo nono

The Said day Cristiane Dumbrek be Dauid Kintor hir spous' vas conuict'
be ane suorne assis' Johnne of Cullane forspekar for the tribulance
of Canne mowat seruand' to gavine murray and' the said' Canne
vas conuict' be the said' assis' for tribulance of the said' Cristiane ffor
the quhilkis Ilkane of tham' vas in ane' amerciament of the cowrt et cetera til
amend' as law wile ande forbeir in tyme to cum Nocht withstanding
the prenotacioun' of the said' tribulance vas fundin in the said' Canne and'
the gretast tribulance

The said' daye the borgh fundin be Dauid Kintor one Alexander bur/
net for the non ressait of half ane' thousand' sclait stanis vas fundin awail
ffor the quhilkis the said' Alexander was in ane amerciament of the Covrt and'
aw to resaue the said' stanis and mak payment tharfor and' that vas givin
for dome

The said' daye Androw gordoun Richart reidheid' gilbert tulidef Johnne
of buchane Alexander Donaldsone and' thomas straloche vas conuict' be
ane suorn' assis' Johnne of Cullane forspekar becaus' thai furnest nocht
the toun' witht breid' of quhit according to the statutis and comone
ordinance maid tharapone ffor the quhilk Ilkane of thame vas in ane'
amerciament of the Cowrt et cetera

The said' day Androwe gordoun' Richard' reidheid' gilbert tulidef
Johanne of buchane Alexander Donaldsone' and' thomas straloch baxtaris
vas conuict' be the said' assis' for baking of Il stuf of breid' of quhit
ffor the quhilk Ilkane of thame vas in ane' amerciament of the court et cetera

The said' daye the baxtaris befor vritin vas conuict' be the said' assis'
Johnne of Cullane forspekar for and' becaus thai varnit nocht the
officiaris of the toun' to cum ande vey the breid' quhen thai var
drawin to se gif thai hald the comone pace of the toun' ffor the
quhilkis Ilkane of thame vas in ane amerciament of the Cowrt et cetera

The said' daye Robert gothra vricht was conuict' be ane' suorne'
assis' Johnne of Cullane forspekar for the disobeying Normund'
leslie in the execucioun of his office ffor the quhilk he vas in ane
amerciament of the Court et cetera

The said' daye Mastir Dauid lousone lauchfullie Callit and' nocht
Comperit to ansueir to the borgh fundin one him be Robert hile
for the vranguis' withhalding fra him of xx s' tharfor the bailyeis
chargit Androw nauchty ane' of the officiaris to pas' ande tak ane'
stres' of the said' mastir Dauidis and' lat It to borgh agane give It
be askit And' varne him to this day xv dais to ansueir to
the said' borgh as first day of proces'

Curia Balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem decimoquarto
die mensis Augusti Anno Dominj et cetera quingentesimo nono

The said It was appontit and accordit betuix charlis stevinsone one that ane
part and mathou red one that vthir part anent ale dettis comptis reknyngis and sovmez'
of money and ale vthir and sindrie debaitis quhatsumeuire and dettis aving be the said mathou'
to vmquhile Johnne of Ratre burges of the said burgh' or that athir of thame has
to say tile vtheris / quhilkis charlis and mathou ar oblist and suorne the gret bodely aitht
to stand' abid' and vnderlie the decreit ordinance and finale sentence arbitrale of thir
personis vnder writin that is to say Johnne of mar and thomas Waus for the part
of the said charlis / and thomas chamer and vilyeame portar for the part of the said
mathou And gif neid' beis gif the said personis can' nocht aggre nor accord' the prouost
gilbert menyeis to be odman to thame quhilkis four personis has takin the said deba
tabile mater to thame and has suorne the greit bodely aitht to deliuer and gif thar
sentence arbitrale tharintile Quhilkis sal convene this Instant day betuix'
the mercat cors' and pas to quhat place thai ples' and commond and decerne apone the
said mater gif thai gudlie may And gif thai cum nocht this day sale haue pouer'
to continev ressaue and heir witnes of athir of the said partijs and thareftir gif thar deliuerance
tharintile quhen thai gudlie may

Curia Balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xvijo
die mensis augustj Anno Dominj quo supra

The said' daye the lard' of ballandrowe obsisit him be the faitht of
his bodye to gilbert menyheis prouest of the said' burgh til entir
Johnne scot befor him within xx dais varning and' he remanit in
scotland'

The saide daye Dauid lamb grantit that he haid ane' langsadil laid' in
rede to him be Katerine andirsone quhilk pertenis to Androw Waus And' the
bailyeis chargit him to deliuer the said' lang sadile agane to the said' androwe
And' the said' Katerine grantit that scho laid' the said langsadil in ved'
to the said' Dauid for thre schillingis and' resauit the said' monee tharapon'

The said' daye the borgh fundin be Dauid lamb one Katerine Andirsone
that scho aucht to releif him of thre schillingis deliuerit ande lent tile
hir be him one ane langsadil quhilk pertenit to Androwe vaus vas
fundin awaile be ane suorn' assis' richart vaus forspekar ffor the quhilk
scho vas in ane amerciament of the Cowrt and' aw to releif the said'
Dauid of the said' thre schillingis et cetera

The said' daye the borgh fundin be malcom' Crag one Androw low
for the vranguis' withhaldin fra him of ane' barrel of tar vas fundin
awaile be ane suorne assis' richard vaus' forspekar ffor the quhilk
the said Androw vas in ane' amerciament of the Cowrt ande aw to deliuer and pay
the said' barrel of tar to the said mallcom and' that vas givin for dome

The saide day Donalde baxtar and thomas buchane was conuict' be ane suorne
assis' Richerde Waus forspekar for brekin of the pas' gevin be the tyme
toune et cetera Ande for bakin of vnsufficient Stuf and becaus' thai furnist nocht the
tovne with brede of quhet according to the commone Statutis maid' tharapon'
and becaus' thai warnit nocht the officiaris to Cum and wey thar breid' for the quhilkis
Ilkan of thame was in four' Amerciamentis of the court et cetera and tile amende as law
wile and forber' in tyme to Cum

Curia Balliuorum burgi de Abirdene Tenta in pretorio eiusdem
vicesimo die mensis augustj Anno dominj millesimo quingentesimo nono

Inquiscio facta Apud burgum de Abirdene vicesimo die mensis augustj Anno
Dominj millesimo quingentesimo nono Coram honorabilibus viris thoma Waus et thoma
leslie duobus balliuorum dictj burgj in pretorio eiusdem protribunali sedenti
per subscriptos videlicet Johannem Collisoun' Duncanum fif Johannem Andersone
Willelmum porter Johannem moyr Ricardum Waus Willelmum rolland' gilber
tum litster Alexandrum Kintor Dauid straloch symonem Ellon' Alexandrum
Tailyour patricium Arthour Adam veyr and phillippum Kelly burgenses
dictj burgi Quj Jurati dicunt quod quondam Wilelmus phelp fratruus
Johannis philp latoris presencium obijt vltimo vestitus et sasitus vt de feodo
ad pacem et fidem dominj nostri regis de quadam terra Inteeriore Jacente infra
dictum burgum in vico furcarum ex orientali parte eiusdem vici inter terram richardj
hile ex australi ex vna et terram quondam Johannis Stewart ex boreali
partibus ab altera ortum quondam Robertj prat versus oriens Et de botha australi
terre anterioris dicti tenementj cum suis pertinenciis Et quod dictus Johannes est legittimus
et propinquior heres eiusdem quondam Willelmi fratruj suj de dictis terre interiore
et botha cum suis pertinenciis Et est quod est legittime etatis Et quod dicte terra et botha
valent nunc per annum quinque solidos Et valuerunt quatuor solidos tempore pacis
Et quod dicte terra Interiore et botha tenentur in Capite de supremo domino nostro
rege per seruicium burgagium per decessum quondam dictj Willelmi Et quod nunc existunt
in manibus Supremj dominj nostri regis legttime per se ipsum ob decessum dicti quondam Willelmi fratruj suj per spacium dimidij annuj aut
eocirca in defectu viri heredis Jus suum huiusque minime prosequentis datum
et clausum sub sigillo dictj thome Waus balliuj et sigillis quorundam eorem
quod hinc Inquisicionj Intererant faciendum Anno die mense et loco prenotatis

The said' daye Adam Weyr grantit that he haid ane siluer spwne
in red' of viij s' and vj d' persewit be Johnne colisoun' in the name
of Cant burges of montros' quhilk the said' Adam haid
laid' in wed' to the chantour of Abirdene And' the bailyeis assignit
and' ordanit the said' Adam to bring the said' spwne befor thame
this day xv dais ffor ministracioun of Justice to be done in the samyn

The saide day Johne brabnire oblist him be the fatht of his bodie that he
suld' nocht Inquiet wex nor trubule Williame lindesay nor his wif in
the Josin of the Inalnd' of vmquhile Walter philp quhile Witson
day that next cumis
